{{cpp/thread/packaged_task/title | get_future}}
{{cpp/thread/packaged_task/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++11 |
std::future&lt;R&gt; get_future();
}}

Returns a {{tt|future}} which shares the same shared state as {{c|*this}}.

{{tt|get_future}} can be called only once for each {{tt|packaged_task}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A future which shares the same shared state as {{c|*this}}.

===Exceptions===
{{lc|std::future_error}} on the following error conditions:

* The shared state has already been retrieved via a call to {{tt|get_future}}. The error category is set to {{ltt|cpp/thread/future_errc|future_already_retrieved}}.
* {{c|*this}} has no shared state. The error category is set to {{ltt|cpp/thread/future_errc|no_state}}.
